briefTitle: Short and Long Term Treatment With 4-AP in Ambulatory SMA Patients
officialTitle: Columbia SMA Project: 4-AP as a Potential SMA Therapeutic Agent and Biological Mechanisms of Action
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess whether 4-AP (Dalfampridine-ER, Ampyra) improves walking ability and endurance in adult patients with Spinal muscular atrophy (SMA) Type 3 compared to placebo and whether the duration of treatment affects outcome.

primaryOutcome.measure: Six Minute Walk Test (6MWT) With Kinematic Evaluation of Gait (Short Term)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Day 14 of each short-term intervention period
